title: Urf Unlimited Mode
body: One day i want to play urf mode where hexa-kill, one for all and blind pick with bans combine into one! on summoner rift. It would be the best urf mode ever

replies.body:
you little bronze ashe kid stole my idea kid.

learn to make your own ideas kid, you literally read my post 2 hours ago and now make this post kid.
Only if both teams get the same champ.
